com.intland.codebeamer.manager

Interface EntityPermissionManager<T extends NamedDto & ReferableDto>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProjectManager, ScmRepositoryManager, TrackerManager

    public interface EntityPermissionManager<T extends NamedDto & ReferableDto>
    An additional interface for managers that do permission based entity access control

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasUserPermission(UserDto user, T entity, java.util.Collection<? extends EntityPermission<T>> permissions)
      Check if the specified user has any of the specified permissions on the specified entity
      boolean hasUserPermission(UserDto user, T entity, EntityPermission<T>... permission)
      Check if the specified user has any of the specified permissions on the specified entity

    • Method Detail

      • hasUserPermission

        boolean hasUserPermission(UserDto user,
                        T entity,
                        EntityPermission<T>... permission)
        Check if the specified user has any of the specified permissions on the specified entity
        Parameters:
        user - whose permissions to check
        entity - is the entity where to check users permissions
        permission - is a variable argument list of entity permissions to check
        Returns:
        true if the user has at least one of the specified entity permissions, otherwise false

      • hasUserPermission

        boolean hasUserPermission(UserDto user,
                        T entity,
                        java.util.Collection<? extends EntityPermission<T>> permissions)
        Check if the specified user has any of the specified permissions on the specified entity
        Parameters:
        user - whose permissions to check
        entity - is the entity where to check users permissions
        permissions - is a Collection of entity permissions to check
        Returns:
        true if the user has at least one of the specified entity permissions, otherwise false
